column2: "Senpai, my request this time comes from the Underground Tunnels. It's a fast Mech called Signo Beat."
"It gets up in your face just like that and slashes away with the weapons on its arms. It's hard for me to even get a chance to aim."
"You never seem to panic, senpai, so maybe you can deal with it? It's still too difficult for me..."
"Please, senpai, show me how to take one down with a Just Attack."
